de Mons
r
Bodley le 2
[4]
de may 1595

page.lettertext:
fol.141r
S
r
, I sturred not abroade these ten daies,
nor I knowe not when I shall, sith I see so
litle hope of better usage at
e
Court:
where
I heare for my c
o
fort,
at
e
Queene
o
Munday
last did wishe I had bin hanged. And if
w
t
all I might heare,
at I should be discharged, to
I would sing
Benedetto sial giorno el mese, et
l'anno.
The inclosed I receaved this
morning out of
Zeland,
w
ch
hath nothing of mo-
ment, but yet it may serve, to intertaine yo
w
half an houre, as I would come to doe
e like, if
I durst goe out of doares: for w
ch
I am certaine
yo
w
will hold me excused,
and repute me as I am
Yo
r
assured to be used in all yo
r
occasions Tho. Bodley
24 May
